head.title: selector-max-empty-lines
head.description: selector-max-empty-lines Limit the number of adjacent empty lines within selectors. Options int: Maximum number of empty lines. For…

body:
#selector-max-empty-lines

Limit the number of adjacent empty lines within selectors.

a,
              /* ← */
b {        /* ↑ */
  color: red; /* ↑ */
}             /* ↑ */
/**              ↑
 *        This empty line */

#Options

int: Maximum number of empty lines.

For example, with 0:

The following patterns are considered warnings:

a

b {
  color: red;
}
a,

b {
  color: red;
}
a

>
b {
  color: red;
}
a
>

b {
  color: red;
}

The following patterns are not considered warnings:

a b {
  color: red;
}
a
b {
  color: red;
}
a,
b {
  color: red;
}
a > b {
  color: red;
}
a
>
b {
  color: red;
}
